categories.name: Fashion
categories.description: Leriya Fashion is the ultimate destination for occasionwear, offering hand-embellished designs and feminine details in luxurious fabrics. Introducing our elegant and versatile Rayon Solid Button Front Shirt Dress with Roll Tab Sleeve & Collared Neck Flared for Women. This dress combines classic style with modern comfort, making it a must-have addition to your wardrobe. Crafted from Best-quality rayon fabric, this dress offers a soft and lightweight feel, ensuring all-day comfort. The solid color adds a touch of sophistication and versatility, making it easy to dress up or down for various occasions. The button front design adds a polished look to the dress, while the collared neck enhances its chic appeal. The flared silhouette creates a flattering fit that accentuates your curves and allows for easy movement. One of the standout features of this dress is the roll tab sleeves, which offer flexibility in styling. You can effortlessly switch between long sleeves and three-quarter sleeves, adapting to changing weather or personal preference. This shirt dress is perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Pair it with sandals or sneakers for a relaxed daytime look, or dress it up with heels and accessories for a more sophisticated ensemble. Whether you're heading to the office, on a brunch date, or at a social gathering, this dress is a versatile choice. Revamp your wardrobe with this stylish and comfortable shirt dress, and elevate your fashion game. Please refer to the size chart to find your perfect fit.

categories.name: Home & Kitchen
categories.description: Quick water absorption & Drying:High-absorbent nanoparticles are used to make the microfibre dish drying Rack for dinnerware. Because of its softness and absorbency, the drying Rack dries fast and effectively conceals stains. Furthermore, the thickness of the dish Rack effectively shields surfaces, cutlery, and glasses from deterioration and contamination.     Easy to Manage and Clean: It is possible to keep the kitchen drying Rack in the drawer without taking up additional space by rolling it up. Simply give the kitchen counter Rack a thorough underwater rinsing if necessary. Once cleaned, it can be dried by natural air circulation by being put on the countertop or hung.     Anti-slip and Durable: The dish drying rack Rack's rubber backing on the bottom provides good anti-skid properties. heat-resistant, waterproof, and non-slip. Place everyday objects on the drying Rack, and they will stay put because the non-slip bottom will absorb into the table. Additionally, the rubber's bottom helps shield the table from spill damage. Dish drying pads for kitchen tableware are long-lasting, wear- and tear-resistant, and both.     Kitchens, bars, bathrooms, etc. can be used in situations where you need to keep dry, and can be cut into coffee Racks, pet food Rack, placeRacks, etc. according to your needs to meet your different needs.     Select number of Racks as per your requirement: You can choose more number of Racks instead of buying big Rack for easy usage and storage

categories.name: Electronics & Gadgets
categories.description: 100% SAFE FOR KIDS AND PETS, PROTECT YOUR FAMILY IN A HEALTHY AND PEAFUL WAY - SROKER pest repellents is 100% safer than traditional mosquito repellents. Many people are naturally worried about the safety of their pets when using an insect repellents device. Studies found that cats and dogs, although they can hear the waves, ultrasonic sound is inaudible to humans and household pets. No poison, smell and chemicals, significantly safe and harmless for kids, pregnant women and pets.     NO RISK PURCHASE - The typical results can take 1-2 weeks depending on the severity of the pest infestation. Mostly can see the electronic pest repeller results within 3-4 weeks! Then we can say goodbye to pests and mice! If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us. We hope you sleep comfortably and have a pest-free environment.     BEST ULTRASONIC PEST REPELLERS, DRIVE THE PEST AWAY QUIET AND EFFECTIVE - If you're considering a non-chemical approach to pest control, we recommend the Ultrasonic Pest Repellers are devices that emit a consistent noise at a frequency that is too high for humans to hear. These sound waves are designed to distract, annoy, and deter common household pests such as roach, spiders, mosquitoes, ants and rodents. Intelligent multi-frequency ultrasonic conversion systems make pests nowhere to hide.     HOW TO USE AN ULTRASONIC REPELLER IN YOUR HOME - Pest repellents are simple to use. All you do is plug pest repellent ultrasonic in an electrical outlet and it will start to repel the pests when the blue night light is on. The repeller should be placed in a location where its noise will not be affected by walls and furniture. It is recommended to install this pest repeller at between 30-50 inches away from the floor for flying pests and 10-30 inches from the ground for crawling pests.     360°PROECT YOUR HOME WITH NO DEAD ZONE - The effective coverage of each pest control is up to 800 square feet. Since ultrasonic sound can’t penetrate walls and solid objects, ONE ROOM ONE UNIT IS RECOMMENDED. 360 degrees protect your home with no dead zone. It's widely used in homes, warehouses, offices, restaurants, supermarkets, hospitals, granary, etc.

categories.name: Pharmacy
categories.description: Experience the ultimate hydration with Emolene Moisturizer, specially formulated to Hydronourish dry skin and restore moisture balance. This non-greasy formulation ensures your skin feels smooth and refreshed without any oily residue. Perfect for all skin types, this moisturizer is non-comedogenic and hypoallergenic, making it safe for even the most sensitive skin     Our fast-absorbing formula delivers deep hydration and helps to smoothen skin, leaving it soft and supple. Emolene Moisturizer is designed for both men and women, providing a lightweight, anti-aging solution that fits seamlessly into your daily skincare routine     Ingredients: PROPYLENE GLYCOL -Restores stratum corneum water content and barrier function, LECITHIN - Lecithin provides depleted phospholipid which act as water binding agent, SQUALENE - Is quickly and efficiently absorbed deep into the skin restoring suppleness and flexibility, DIMETHICONE - Forms layers on the skin that retains everything & anything beneath the skin, GLYCERINE -Act as a humectant and smoothens the skin.     Key benefits – non-greasy formulation, Quick Absorption, Hypoallergic, Does not block pores

subSubCategories.name: Vitamins
subSubCategories.description: STRENGTHENS IMMUNE RESPONSE - Organic India Immunity Capsules are designed to enhance the immune system by supporting the body's natural defense mechanisms. Each capsule is made with carefully selected organic herbs that work synergistically to promote resilience against everyday challenges. Organic India Immunity Capsules are ideal for daily use to maintain overall health and vitality.     EASES COLD AND COUGH SYMPTOMS - Organic India Immunity Capsules offer effective relief from common cold and cough symptoms by supporting respiratory health and strengthening the immune system. Formulated with organic herbs known for their soothing properties, Organic India Immunity Capsules help improve overall comfort and wellness, promoting faster recovery from occasional respiratory discomfort.     HELPS PROTECT AGAINST INFECTIONS - Organic India Immunity Capsules protect the body from everyday infections by enhancing the body's natural immunity. Organic India Immunity Capsules combine ancient herbal wisdom with modern practices to deliver a reliable solution for staying healthy in various conditions, making them an essential part of your daily wellness routine.     CERTIFIED ORGANIC AND CHEMICAL-FREE - Organic India Immunity Capsules are made using certified organic ingredients, free from any artificial fillers, chemicals, or preservatives. Manufactured with precision and care, Organic India Immunity Capsules ensure purity and efficacy, providing a safe and natural way to support immunity and overall well-being for the entire family.     COMMITTED TO SUSTAINABILITY - Organic India Immunity Capsules are crafted in a LEED Platinum Certified facility, showcasing a strong commitment to environmental sustainability. Organic India Immunity Capsules reflect the brand's dedication to protecting the planet while delivering high-quality, effective products that promote health, well-being, and a more sustainable future.

subSubCategories.name: Herbal Supplements
subSubCategories.description: SCIENCE-BACKED 11 POTENT AYURVEDIC HERBS: Kapiva Dia Free Juice is a blend of 11 Ayurvedic herbs that help in managing uncontrolled spikes in Blood sugar levels and eases out the complications of Blood Sugar such as improper digestion, low energy, and weak immunity.     CONTROL BLOOD SUGAR LEVELS: Herbs such as Karela, Amla, Jamun, Tulsi, Guduchi, Methi and Belpatra, optimize the production of hormones by breaking down glucose from foods. Regular consumption of this juice can help in maintaining optimal sugar levels within 3 months of consumption.     100% AYURVEDIC: This juice does not contain any added sugar or artificial taste-enhancers. It is 100% Ayurvedic and safe to be consumed along with your regular allopathic medications.     NATURALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS: All ingredients are sourced from the choicest locations and mixed in the right proportions for maximum nutrition - Amla from Pratapgarh, Neem from Rajasthan, and so on. Each bottle of Dia Free Juice contains 45 Amlas, 24 Jamun Seeds, 1 Whole Karela and more - the best of herbs recommended in traditional texts to treat madhumeh.     HOW TO CONSUME: Mix 30ml Dia Free Juice with 30ml of water and consume it twice a day for long-term health benefits. If taken in the morning, should be taken on an empty stomach. Consume regularly for 3 Months for best results.

subCategories.name: Health Devices
subCategories.description: Dr. Morepen glucose blood glucose monitor model bg 03 is a smart glucose monitor that helps you measure blood glucose levels, quickly, accurately and comfortably. The readings from the glucose meter are only to be used for general information purposes - they are not a substitute for a medical examination from a registered medical practitioner discuss your results with a registered medical practitioner. Never use the results to make medical decisions independently. Seek prompt medical attention for health care questions you have. Consult your physician before making changes to your medication, diet, fitness program, or blood glucose testing schedules.

subSubCategories.description: Mamaearth's 100 percent natural mosquito repellent patch for babies. I am deet free with no harmful chemicals, insecticides or pesticides. I do not cause any side effects like eye irritation or skin damage as i am a 100 percent natural blend of citronella, eucalyptus, peppermint oil and lemon extract. My powerful mosquito repellent blend protects your loved ones from dengue, malaria and chikungunya. I can be pasted on your child's clothes, cot, pram and schoolbag. I offer up to 12 hours of protection from mosquito bites. I am waterproof and can be used for both indoor and outdoor activities. I do not leave any residue on clothes after removal.

categories.name: Sports & Fitness
categories.description: COMPREHENSIVE CORE STRENGTHENING: Elevate your core workout routine with our Abroller, a fitness essential designed for comprehensive core strengthening. This ab wheel roller for men ergonomic design ensures proper form and targets key muscle groups, offering an effective and focused workout for your abdominal region. As an added feature, this ab roller wheel includes a knee mat for comfortable knee placement during exercises, ensuring a holistic approach to your fitness journey.     COMPACT AND PORTABLE FITNESS COMPANION: Experience the flexibility of our Ab exercise roller, a compact and portable fitness companion that allows you to engage in effective ab workouts anytime, anywhere. Its portable design ensures that you can maintain your fitness routine whether you're at home, in the gym, or on the go. The included knee mat enhances your workout experience by providing a cushioned surface for your knees, ensuring comfort during exercises.     COMFORTABLE AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Prioritize comfort and durability with our stomach exercise equipment , crafted with high-quality materials to withstand rigorous workouts. The comfortable padding supports your back, and the sturdy construction ensures longevity, providing a reliable and comfortable fitness tool for your core exercises. The accompanying knee mat adds an extra layer of comfort, making your workout sessions more enjoyable and sustainable.     VERSATILE AB WORKOUT OPTIONS: Unleash the full potential of your ab workouts with the versatility of our abs machine. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced fitness enthusiast, this tool offers various exercise options to target different areas of your core. From rollouts to planks, experience a comprehensive ab workout with one versatile piece of equipment. The knee mat enhances your workout flexibility, allowing you to focus on perfecting your form without discomfort.     EFFICIENT AND RESULTS-DRIVEN FITNESS: Elevate your fitness journey with our gym roller, an efficient and results-driven tool that maximizes the impact of your core workouts. Engage in exercises that not only challenge your abdominal muscles but also contribute to overall body strength and stability. This abs roller for women includes knee mat ensures that your workout is not only effective but also comfortable, promoting consistency and long-term fitness success.

categories.name: Stationery
categories.description: Discover Premium Stationery Accessories for Home, School & Office Stay organized, creative, and productive with our wide range of high-quality stationery accessories. Whether you're a student, a working professional, an artist, or a planner lover — we have everything you need to bring your ideas to life.  📝 Essentials for Everyday Use Notebooks & Journals – From classic ruled notebooks to creative bullet journals, perfect for writing, doodling, and planning.  Pens & Pencils – Smooth, reliable, and stylish writing tools, including gel pens, fountain pens, mechanical pencils, and more.  Markers & Highlighters – Brighten up your notes, make key points stand out, and color-code with ease.  Sticky Notes & Index Tabs – Perfect for quick reminders, bookmarks, and study notes.  🎨 Creative & Art Supplies Sketchbooks & Drawing Pads – Ideal for artists, architects, and designers.  Color Pencils, Crayons & Watercolors – Bring your imagination to life with vivid, high-quality colors.  Brush Pens & Calligraphy Kits – For handwriting enthusiasts and aspiring calligraphers.  🗂️ Organizational Tools Folders & Files – Keep documents neat and accessible with stylish file organizers.  Desk Organizers – Tidy up your workspace with multi-compartment holders for pens, clips, and papers.  Whiteboards & Planners – Plan your week or month with dry-erase boards, calendars, and to-do lists.  ✂️ Office & School Accessories Scissors, Staplers & Punches – Essential tools for school bags and office desks.  Tape Dispensers & Glue Sticks – Durable and easy-to-use for everyday crafting or packaging.  Erasers & Sharpeners – Compact and functional accessories that complete your pencil case.

categories.name: Automotive
categories.description: Explore Premium Bike Accessories for Every Ride Upgrade your biking experience with top-quality bike accessories designed for safety, style, and performance. Whether you're a daily commuter, a weekend rider, or a long-distance adventurer, the right gear can transform your journey.  🚨 Essential Accessories Helmet – Stay protected with DOT/ECE certified helmets. Stylish, aerodynamic, and built for comfort.  Riding Gloves – Grip better, ride longer. Protect your hands from friction, weather, and impact.  Knee & Elbow Guards – Crucial protection for off-road and city rides.  Bike Covers – All-weather protection to keep your motorcycle safe from dust, rain, and sun.  🌟 Performance & Utility Mobile Holders – Secure mounts for navigation on the go.  Luggage Carriers & Saddlebags – More space for travel essentials, without compromising stability.  Phone Chargers & USB Ports – Stay connected even on long road trips.
